C

changeDirectory(String directoryPath!) - method in class WebDavClient

Changes the current repository URL to the given only if the given directory could be resolved and it could be read(= is a WebDav directory).

If the directory's content could not be read, an error is thrown.


close() - method in class WebDavClient

Closes the connection.


copy(String source!, String destination!) - method in class WebDavClient

Copies the source at the given path to the given destination. The method doesn't overwrite the destination resource if it already exists.

If you want to copy a resource and overwrite the resource at a given destination use the #copy(String, String, Boolean) method


copy(String source!, String destination!, Boolean overwrite!) - method in class WebDavClient

Copies the source at the given path to the given destination. The method overwrites the resource at the given destination depending on the given boolean switch.


createDirectory(String directoryName!) - method in class WebDavClient

Creates the directory with the given name in the current directory. The method also accepts a multiple directory syntax, allowing to create multiple directories at once. For example: createDirectory("directory1/directory2").

The method also allows a relative path syntax, so that you can do something like: createDirectory("../directory1")


D

delete(String fileLocation!) - method in class WebDavClient

Deletes the resource at the given location if it exists. if it does not, an error is thrown.


deleteDirectory(String directoryName!) - method in class WebDavClient

Deletes the directory at the given location, or throws an error if the given location doesn't exist.


E

exists(String resourcePath!) - method in class WebDavClient

Checks if a resource exists with the given path relative to the current directory. Returns true if it exists, false otherwise.


G

get(String filePath!) - method in class WebDavClient

Download the file at the given location into the current directory. If a file with a similar name is already existing it will be overwritten.


get(String filePath!, String localFilePath!) - method in class WebDavClient

Downloads the file at the given location and saves it at the given file path.


L

listResources() - method in class WebDavClient

Lists the content of the current repository and returns a ResultSet with a DataRow for each entry of the repository with its properties.


listResources(String url!) - method in class WebDavClient

Lists the content of the given repository and returns a ResultSet with a DataRow for each entry of the repository with its properties.


M

move(String source!, String destination!) - method in class WebDavClient

Moves the source from the given location to the given destination. The method doesn't overwrite the resource at the destination it if already exists. If you want to overwrite the resource at the destination location, use the #move(String, String, Boolean) method.


move(String source!, String destination!, boolean overwrite!) - method in class WebDavClient

Moves the source from the given location to the given destination. The method overwrites the resource at the given destination depending on the given boolean switch.


O

open(String url!, String username!, String password!) - method in class WebDavClient

The method connects to the given WebDav repository using the given credentials, if the connection could be established the url is saved and will be used for all other methods provided by this class. If the connection fails and Error is thrown.


open(String url!) - method in class WebDavClient

The method connects to the given WebDav repository, if the connection could be established the url is saved and will be used for all other methods provided by this class. If the connection fails and Error is thrown.


P

put(String filePath!) - method in class WebDavClient

Uploads the file spcified with the given name/path to the Server in the current directory. The method doesn't check if the file exists or not, if it exists it will be overwritten.


put(String filePath!, String remoteFileLocation!) - method in class WebDavClient

Uploads the file spcified with the given name/path to the Server at the given location. The method doesn't check if the file exists or not, if it exists it will be overwritten.


pwd() - method in class WebDavClient

Returns the current WebDav workind directory.


W

WebDavClient - class in this project

WebDavClient() - constructor in class WebDavClient
